name: The way to next life
description:
When a creature dies, the soul leaves its original body and enters reincarnation. But one little ghost missed reincarnation at the time of his death and became a lonely ghost. In order to succeed in reincarnation, the brat sets out on a journey to find the Soul Reincarnation Lamp. The transmigration lamp is kept in a Taoist temple by human Taoists, whose objects are tainted with magical powers that can harm the little ghost. To add insult to injury, the brat caught a cold because of a plague pandemic on earth. See what happens to the ghost!
